analysis.key_quote: Allowing this proposal to go forward will further contribute to the dehumanizing, demoralizing, and undemocratic method currently being employed to eliminate thousands of positions or to fill those positions with loyalists.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the lack of accountability and due process for employees, as well as the potential for politicization of the civil service. It emphasizes the importance of maintaining a non-partisan and merit-based public service.
